mean_en: any one of various substances found in certain foods (such as bread, rice, and potatoes) that provide your body with heat and energy and are made of carbon, hydrogen, and oxygen
word_etyma: carbo碳+hydr水+ate有...性质的 → 有碳和水的性质的 → 碳水化合物
short_phrase: Pancakes have a lot of carbohydrates.
sentence: Carbohydrates are the main component of noodles, bread and steamed buns.
sentence_trans: 碳水化合物是面包、面条和馒头的主要成分。
